main.*:
:''For other characters see [[Leslie]] and [[Leslie Buffay]].''

'''Leslie''' is the casting director auditioning [[Joey Tribbiani|Joey]] in "[[The One With Ross And Monica's Cousin]]". Qhe was portrayed by [[Mo Gaffney]].

Leslie is impressed when Joey reveals he's an Italian American and puts him up for an audition but is unaware that Joey has lied as the part calls for an uncircumcised man.
